programme.title: Benjis Ordeal
programme.desc: Benjis life takes a dangerous turn and he does odd jobs for survival and to keep his kids in school without their knowledge. Little did he know what this decision could cause.

programme.title: Marriage Disappointment
programme.desc: Adanna is accused of charming her sisters so that they do not get married before her, this however did not change anything as every man that comes for Adanna dies mysteriously.

programme.title: The Prince And The Maid
programme.desc: A prince comes back to the palace to be crowned, and interestingly all the maids want him to marry them. The prince is about to make a choice that will shock the entire palace.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna and Nnanna make a choice. Jideofor has a conversation with Kamharida, and Jidekene bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Sexy Uprising
programme.desc: Chief Okeke is hell bent on frustrating Silas from helping his command aspiration for the community, but Princess Golibe decides to make sure his dream comes through.

programme.title: Back From Prison
programme.desc: After the prince Leo kills Chief Mbas daughter, Ahanna, his driver goes to jail for him, and the palace plan his death in prison. After seven years Ahanna shows up.

programme.title: The Price
programme.desc: Dave is broke and but is blessed from a coven after birth, now his spiritual wife is here to make him rich and take him away from Mercy the love of his life.

programme.title: Marriage Reconciliation
programme.desc: Sam loves Felicia deeply and chooses to marry her, embracing her daughter as his own. But when Felicia becomes pregnant with his child, his attitude changes.

programme.title: Once Married
programme.desc: Jessica leaves her abusive husband, only to face the same pain from other men. Now she must fight for her peace and prepare for love again with the help of her son Derrick.

programme.title: Beyond The Frame
programme.desc: Alicias mom will do everything to keep her daughter from men, but it is now becoming unbearable as this will change the path of Alicias life.

programme.title: Power Of Blindness
programme.desc: Okwuonye will do anything to marry the prince, but the prince will never look her way. Prince Oguduniru tries everything to make princess Kira love and marry him.

programme.title: Depth Of Despair
programme.desc: While trying to mend their marriage, a couple becomes entangle in a dangerous situation, putting their relationship and their future together at serious jeopardy.

programme.title: Big Brother Naija: Head Of House...
programme.sub-title: Big Brother Naija: Head Of House Challenge.
programme.desc: The Head of House in Big Brother Naija sets the tone for the week, influences house dynamics, and may secure immunity. Who will rise to power and claim the crown this week?

programme.title: Big Brother Naija: Daily Shows
programme.desc: In Biggies House, 24 hours brings romance, ships sink, and shifting alliances. Missed the excitement? Catch all the drama in todays daily wrap of the Big Brother Naija action.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Obi is released from custody. Senami confronts Kingsley. The elders make a decision regarding the fate of Aji.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: Arabang tries to persuade Thozama to testify in court. Neo and Rendani cant hide their feelings for each other, while Nombuso flirts boldly with Buzwe.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Frank makes a deal with Akin inorder to keep the Flatmates in the flat.

programme.title: Hustle

programme.title: Isibaya

programme.desc: When postman Ma and three other mismatched allies deliver a secret cargo to the rebel leader, Ma finds himself on a patriotic quest to save the country and himself.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Madam Fong leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the HK Deputy Commissioner of Police.

programme.title: The Heroic Trio
programme.desc: Newborn babies destined to be emperors are kidnapped by the Evil Master. The police are powerless, so the city must be saved by three women with superb fighting skills.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.

programme.title: Iceman The Time Traveler
programme.desc: In this sequel, the four imperial guards are defrosted and reanimated in modern times. With different motives in mind, they strive to find their way back in time...

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, one a drug lord and the other a police officer, clash in an endless battle between good and evil in a drug cartels turf war.

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: When a Hong Kong policewoman, a Japanese detective and a security officer foil a plane hijacking attempt, they incur the wrath of the hijackers who are out for vengeance.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Tigers
programme.desc: Five cops find their careers and their lives in jeopardy when they accept a 10 million dollar bribe from a drug smuggler, to release him from custody during a drug bust.

programme.title: The Avenging Fist
programme.desc: A young man uses martial arts skill founded by his father, and the Power Glove, a tool that unleashes mind power, to battle rebels intending to dominate the world.

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Blind Detective
programme.desc: A blind former detective, who possesses an uncanny ability to solve cold cases for police reward, teams up with a hit team detective in search of her missing friend.

programme.title: The Dead And The Deadly
programme.desc: A murderous plot to claim the fortune of a wealthy family is thwarted when the spirit of the victim enters the body of a young sorcerer to take revenge.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey Of A Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Nui uses his boxing skills to help the weak fight villains. He accepts a death combat challenge so as to take revenge for his friend.

programme.title: Once A Gangster
programme.desc: Two former gangsters are tapped to run in an election for leader of the triad gang, but both want to preserve their peaceful lives. Each must outwit the other to lose.

programme.title: Black Cat
programme.desc: A tough and rebellious girl is recruited by the CIA and trained to be a deadly assassin. Her life changes when she gets to know about real life from killing.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu, and must fight for Cao. He has to fight a dangerous battle before he can rescue Lius concubine from Cao.

programme.title: The Black Panther Warriors
programme.desc: Tasked with retrieving a classified file, the mercenary Black Cougar assembles a squad of elite warriors to embark on this perilous mission.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: An accomplished cop who sinks into a deep depression after his wife was killed, is forced to return to action when a former cop is implicated in a murder case.

programme.title: Motorway
programme.desc: On the streets of Hong Kong, an arrogant rookie cop and his veteran partner confront a legendary getaway driver, using their cars as weapons in a high stakes showdown.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

programme.title: Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The sudden appearance of one man in a world where apes are in charge and humans are enslaved serves as a challenge to the status quo.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A group of self-absorbed actors sets out to make the most expensive war film. However, the director leads his cast into the jungles of Asia, where they encounter bad guys.

programme.title: Deadtectives
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators from TV go to Mexicos most haunted house in the pursuit of ratings.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Twenty thousand years ago, Earth was being overrun by glaciers, and creatures everywhere were fleeing the onslaught of the new Ice Age.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: TNT unleashes an action driven, pulse raising slate, mixed with romantic gems and hilarious comedy aimed to keep its audiences glued to their screens!

programme.title: Injustice
programme.desc: Based on the critically acclaimed video game and graphic novel, Injustice unleashes an all-out war fought by DCs mightiest. Can the world survive?

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A rescue pilot and his estranged wife embark on a treacherous journey to save their daughter after a catastrophic earthquake.

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: The director of Traffic leads tough MMA star Gina Carano in a tense thriller that follows a skilled female operative working to exact revenge on those who double-crossed her.

programme.title: Paradise City
programme.desc: Ryan Swan must carve his way through the Hawaiian crime world to wreak vengeance on the kingpin who murdered his father.

programme.title: Absolute Deception
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr stars in this action film. A widowed reporter seeks the help of a federal agent to investigate her husbands secrets, but they soon become targets.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Whether regarded as thief or hero, one man from humble beginnings will become an eternal symbol of freedom for his people.

programme.title: Red Heat
programme.desc: A tough, disciplined Russian policeman teams up with an unpredictable, wise-cracking Chicago detective to capture a Russian criminal in the US.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: Survivors of a suspension-bridge collapse learn that there is no way to Death.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: A gangster that everyone believed to be dead mysteriously reappears to avenge himself upon his former boss and find his missing son.

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: An office employee and a soap salesman discover that fighting each other releases their tension. They start an underground fight club to help vent male aggression.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark Of The Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots race against the Decepticons to reach the Cybertronian spacecraft, which could turn the tide in their final battle.

programme.title: An Argentinian Crime
programme.desc: Argentina, 1980. As the country goes through a dark period, the police and the military go after the criminal mind behind a seemingly perfect crime.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4
programme.desc: Ageing cops, played by Mel Gibson and Danny Glover, take on kung fu master Jet Li in this movie thats high on laughter and action!

programme.title: Dr. Birds Advice for Sad Poets
programme.desc: In the emotionally charged and wild world of James Whitman, we see his struggle to overcome anxiety and depression by seeking advice from Dr. Bird.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Mad Max is swept up in a high-octane road war with a group of rebels fleeing from a ruthless warlord in this Oscar-winning fourth instalment.

programme.title: The Gardener
programme.desc: An immigrant working a quiet life as a gardener at a manor house in England has to rely on old skills to save the family he works for from home invaders.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran has retreated to a Buddhist monastery in Thailand to find inner peace. However, he is contacted by his mentor for help with a top-secret mission in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Raw Deal
programme.desc: An unconventional former FBI agent is re-hired to bring down a Chicago organised crime syndicate.
